c-1: ^What are your thoughts on the others in the archipelago?

c-0: ^What's your story? How did you come to live here?
^My parents came here with me onboard when I was young. Couldn't have been much older than ten.
^It was foggy out and they wound up heading straight into a boulder.
^Our ship was wrecked, just like yours. But we were okay.
^My parents raised a fuss about the lighthouse not working. Took it up with the residents.
^They took it upon themselves to get it up and running. Didn't even make plans on leaving at all.
^We eventually just considered this to be our new home.
^Some decades later, they became too old and rusty to keep running up and down all these stairs.
^I've been the one tending to the lighthouse ever since.
c-1: ^Do you ever want to leave this place?
^This life suits me. I like living in the lighthouse, I've got an important job... Why would I leave?
^Doesn't need to be more complicated than that.

c-0: ^I like Bengt. We're on good terms.
^I remember when he was just a snot-nosed brat fiddling with all the mechanisms up here.
^Funny guy. I never understood his fascination with this stuff.
^All I care about is if it works or not.
c-1: ^The few times we do talk, she's asking for updates on her sister.
^Feels like a reminder that I failed to keep my eye on someone important to her. I don't like it.
^It's a shame... I do respect her. She's smart.

c-0: ^I admire that he has the energy to tend to his plants every day.
^Considering his allergies and his age... that takes drive.
^I heard others got a bad first impression from him, but I didn't. Neither did my folks.
^If you're a good person you won't need to worry about pleasantries. It's how you act that counts.
^Anyway, Ulrich might seem gruff, but he's a good fellow.
c-1: ^I don't like how that pest threatens our boaters. Makes it unsafe for travel around here.
^I want it gone. Hunted or chased out - I don't care which.
^Vera insists on keeping it around. Says the Kraken doesn't feed on the rare fish around here...
^...and that it keeps away other predators that could mess with the ecosystem if they were to invade it.
^I respect her opinion, but... no. I don't.
^It's skewed to care more for some fish than our people's safety. That irritates me.
